Best Workout to Develop Explosiveness | Athletic Performance

One of the best ways for any athlete to boost his or her acceleration, top speed, and agility is to practice sprinting against resistance.

Resisted training helps athletes increase their speed-to-strength ratio which improves their ability to generate greater force during sprint starts, or during any quick accelerations while sprinting.

3 Reasons Why Sled Pull Training Works
1) Keeps you Low
2) Educates Neuromuscular System on the Importance of the Drive Phase
3) Body Feels Relaxed when Sprinting after Resisted Sled Pulls

The most important factor of a successful sprint-resisted training exercise is to increase the drag on the athlete without altering good running mechanics and form.

Using a weight sled or otherwise dragging weight while sprinting creates a constant load on the muscles used for acceleration and top speed sprints. It's basically a mix of sprint drills and weight training. When done correctly with proper form, weight sleds are a great training tool.

I'm not stating this as fact, but merely something to consider. While many studies do say that sex increases testosterone, there is significant evidence to think that abstaining might help in multiple areas (maybe not necessarily in the area of testosterone). Some believe that the reason for this is because we evolved to spread our genes, and when we keep ejaculating, we're telling our body that our genes are spreading, therefore, our body doesn't feel the need to improve itself to find a mate/mates. By the same idea, when we abstain, our body improves itself in multiple areas in order to make ourselves more attractive to potential partners. Again, this hasn't been demonstrated through research, but it WOULD make for an interesting study . . .

It is a scientific fact that testosterone increases when abstaining from PMO. In March/April 2003, Jiang M, Xin J, Zou Q and Shen JW from the Science department of the J Zhejiang University published a paper called "A research on the relationship between ejaculation and serum testosterone level in men." The research consisted of 28 volunteers who were tested. The results shown that after 7 days, the men's testosterone increases by over 145.7% which is basically more then what most steroids will give you at the gym.
